Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the period during which the county of Orleans is authorized to impose additional rates of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the period during which the county of Orleans is authorized to impose additional rates of sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the period during which the county of Orleans is authorized to impose additional rates of sales and compensating use taxes
